Title: Mongol Empire Trade Route Control
Cascade_Pattern: Route Closure & Regulatory Shock → Lead-time spikes → Allocation rationing → Bullwhip amplification across tiers
Early_Warning_Signals: Forecast error spikes | Lead-time variance increase | Service-level dips
Resilience_Strategy (Agentic AI + Blockc: Compliance oracles (sanctions, export control) gating transactions on-chain | Tokenized inventory & capacity auctions among approved partners | Multi-sourcing agent negotiation with on-chain supplier reputation scores | On-chain supplier & lane attestation (quality, ESG, certifications) with real-time oracle feeds | Sentinel agents for anomaly & drift detection on IoT/ERP/TMS streams | Digital twin + simulation agents for cascade prediction and recovery planning | Smart-contract playbooks for rerouting, re-sourcing, and SLA-based compensation | Ledger-anchored KPI telemetry (OTIF, dwell time, recovery time) for audit and learning
